## Discussion

Use the `date` to identify a fall event. The system guarantees fall events have different `date` values.

# date

**Instance Property**

The event’s time and date.

## Declaration

```swift
var date: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the `date` to identify a fall event. The system guarantees fall events have different `date` values.
title: date
